doc:
Vincent Beck https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vincent_Beck 0 Vincent Beck was a tall American character actor with a deep voice who began his career as a stage actor. He was a prolific film and television actor who acted in films such as Santa Claus Conquers the Martians in 1964, The Spy in the Green Hat in 1967, The Scorpio Letters in 1967, The Pink Jungle in 1968 and in the same year, The Bamboo Saucer. He also was in Vigilante in 1983. He also appeared in at least 26 different television shows which included The Monkees, Get Smart, Daniel Boone, The Man from U.N.C.L.E., Bonanza, The Time Tunnel, and Lost In Space. Vincent_Beck was a_tall_American_character_actor with a_deep_voice who began his_career as a_stage_actor . He also was in Vigilante in 1983 .
